name: Renovate My Heart
description:
Repair your new home with the power of love and anime!  

Available in the browser you're looking at RIGHT NOW or download for PC/Mac (which runs smoother in my experience)

THE CHOICE IS YOURS AND YOURS ALONE

Play it!  Or don't!

Version Log

1.2 - itch.io Release!
---------
* Additional sfx
* Additional background images
* Option to loop back to introductions after finishing a route
* Completion scenes when all endings (good + bad) for a character are discovered
* Changes to sound triggers
* Changes to dialogue

1.1 - Playcraft NYC Winter Game Expo Release!
---------
* New post game route
* New audio tracks 
* 2 new Bad Endings
* Additional dialog in Window and Wall routes
* Counter displayed on each Bad End screen
* Color adjustments for character text boxes

1.0 - GGJ Release!
--------
* We did it in a weekend!
